KH.content: mytheme, acc. Hegel, will have been a prephilosopheme promised to a dialectical Aufhebung

GOD.content: [economy of the sacrifice] in turn toward new mystery, toward new structure of responsibility, prior one never eliminated, kept w/in oneself, mourned as crypt of a more ancient secret > is this repression, is this a kind of sacrificial Aufhebung?

LOBL.content: antagony from arrêt to arrêt, an Aufhebung that never lets up, arrêt arresting arrêt, both senses, both ways

EM.content: Aufheben is relever: at the same time > déplacer, élever, remplacer et promouvoir

VM.content: “alterity, difference, and time are not suppressed but retained by absolute knowledge in the form of the Aufhebung”
[do for all words what Hegel did for Aufhebung? no, see DS p. 200]

PPHS.content: Aufhebung facilitates spirit’s elevation beyond that within which it was submerged, sublimates nature into itself > presenting itself to itself as such
authority of voice: coordinated w/ entire Hegelian system: its archeology, teleology, eschatology, its will to parousia > process of sign is an Aufhebung, negativity
Hegel: negativity of intelligence, Aufhebung of sign relieves/promotes beyond natural, sensual, spatial

T.content: Marges concerns relevance of limit, a reading of the Hegelian Aufhebung, a reading beyond Hegel’s own intention, beyond that which is inscribed on the internal vestibule of his ear, where Hegel’s text would be a writing machine of “conscious intention,” thus a mechanical reader

F.content: otherness before opposition btwn introj./incorp. not the contradiction of telos of Aufhebung, but undecidable irresolution: paradoxically incorp. doesn’t preserve other [garde une topique, mantient sauve], introj. more open [to other] > makes it impossible for the 2 to close over their proper, their death, their corpse

DS.content: Aufhebung—most “relevant” way of (re)covering (up) graphics of supplementarity or hymen, le recouvrement le plus séduisant, because most similar > thus, must critique Aufhebung as decisive target, that which obfuscates specificity of “writing operation”

OS.content: space becomes concrete by retaining/restoring negative w/in itself, by negating itself

1st negative determination of space is the POINT (the place that does not take place), it then negates itself in relation the LINE > als sich aufhebend, point is the line, the Being-spatial of point > then comes the PLANE (surface) > each next stage only made of the negated prior stage, i.e. line made of negated points
“always too late to ask the question of time” re: spatialization

point & time thought in circularity together (Aufhebung, speculative negativity, only possible by means of infinite correlation or reflection) > time is spacing, space is time > thus for Aristotle, stigmē, punctuality, determines nowness (nun, jetzt)
Hegel: Notion is in and for itself absolute (total) negativity and freedom
for Hegel, time erases time, Tilgen (to erase) is also an Aufhebung: given that time is pure exterior self, parousia is end of time

POS.content: if there’s a definition of differance, it’s the limit, interruption, destruction of Hegel’s relève, wherever it is
differance not Hegel’s difference of contradiction, which uses a third term to resolve, synthesize, aufheben
Houdebine says “no Aufhebung here,” Derrida responds: there is always Aufhebung, just as there is always repression, sublimation, idealization
Derrida does not apply spacing to negate that which is ‘present,’ this would remain logic of Hegelian Aufhebung, Derrida’s nonpresence not found in opposition presence/absence

ROP.content: repetition compulsion (advocatus diaboli of death drive) as resource & limit (à la fois) of psychoanalysis > analytic position set going endlessly, w/out Aufhebung, in paradox of Bindung and Erlöschung (solution, extinction): no analytic position when resistance is unidentifiable

DIF.content: Aufhebung constrained into writing itself otherwise, or simply into writing itself, or taking into account its consumption of writing (sa consommation d’écriture) [re: general/restricted economy]

O.content: differance inscribes contradictions, is the critical limit of idealizing powers of la relève (Aufgehoben), which reduces contradictions to homogeneity of single model

DPi.content: Hugo’s abolitionism: disappearance of social order of past (priest, executioner, king), but order remains, what counts is what remains, the reste, of the turning, of the Christian Aufhebung ——Hugo: “cross will be substituted for the gallows”

the logic of Aufhebung’s remainder & fact that Christianity, unlike Judaism/Islam, is also an immanentist humanism (mediation of God made man) > brings Camus’ atheistic abolitionism closest to Hugo’s Christological transcendence

RGE.content: conservation of Aufhebung: circulation & self-reproduction as reproduction of meaning
Aufhebung amortizes absolute expenditure (la dépense absolue), works the “putting at stake” into an investment (à élaborer la mise en jeu en investissement) > it’s laughable
acc. Bataille, to be indifferent to comedy of Aufhebung (like Hegel was)—to blind oneself to experience of sacred, to heedless sacrifice of presence & meaning

Aufhebung: produced entirely w/in system/work of signification, from one infinite determination to the next, each one conserved in the other, transitions produced by anxiety of infinity—included w/in circle of absolute knowledge, never suspends totality of discourse (work, meaning, law), never exceeds its closure > restricted economy, circulation of prohibitions: history as truth of prohibitions
laughter’s burst does not maintain itself (not negative), laughs at Aufhebung

REST.content: to “put aside (mettre de côté)” once bizarre, but here interesting translation of Aufheben [re: Heidegger putting Van Gogh picture aside]

ATAP.content: via Kant, apocalypse as dream of raising (aufheben) veil of Isis

SPEC.content: Bindung inaugurates, assures, overflows PP (mastery), as seat of its condition
no relève of PP—not Hegelian [since PP always master?] > in fact, function of PP, (postal) binding, determines interpretation of Aufhebung

FV.content: systemic & historical link btwn idealization, relève (Aufhebung), and the voice > Lacan’s elevation of signifier
Lacan: “the phallus is the signifier of this Aufhebung itself, which it inaugurates (initiates) by its disappearance”
Lacan reversed Hegel: not ideal signified but ideal signifier
